children.text:
Welcome to Symbols keyboard & text art

Forget old school smileys! 
TextArt is the new way to let friends and family know how you feel.

Use a large collection of text art divided in different categories so you can easily find what you need. 

When you have found the right image, send it by sms, mail or Facebook.

For SMS and Facebook, the compatible images are subdivided in the according tabs. In the settings page, you can set the maximum characters per SMS message. 
By mail you can send all the images you want! 

★☆★ THIS IS THE FREE VERSION OF TEXTART WITH A 10 DAY TRIAL FOR OUR SYMBOLS KEYBOARD. ENJOY THE FREE TEXT ART AND DISCOVER THE SYMBOLS KEYBOARD!!! ★☆★ 

Symbol keyboard setup

With the first Android Symbols keyboard you can add special symbols to all your texts (sms, mail, facebook, blog,...). 
• Enable the ‘Symbols keyboard Pro’ in your ‘Locale and text’ settings
• Hold down your finger on whatever textfield
• Select the ‘input method’. 

Not all symbols are recognised on all devices! Make sure to check if your messages are received correctly!

IMPORTANT:from now you should switch keyboards using long tap on s1 key
